zh_CN: 其实，我也很喜欢看一些比较温馨的小说，虽然它们的情节不算复杂，但总能让我感到一种宁静的力量。
en:
Actually, I also enjoy reading some heartwarming novels. Although their plots aren’t very complex,
they always bring me a sense of peaceful strength.

zh_CN: 比如《小王子》啊，虽然是儿童文学，但里面的每一句话都让我觉得……很深刻。
en:
For example, The Little Prince.
Even though it’s a children’s book, every sentence in it feels... so profound.

zh_CN: 尤其是“你为你的玫瑰花费的时间，使得它变得如此重要”这句话，给了我很多思考的空间。
en: Especially the line, 'You become responsible, forever, for what you have tamed.' It has given me a lot to reflect on.
